revised_title: Exact Solutions for the Ashkin-Teller Model on Various Lattices
tldr: The authors present exact solutions for the Ashkin-Teller model on various lattices, including the square, triangular, and hexagonal lattices. They demonstrate how the model can be transformed using dual and star-triangle transformations and show that it can be reduced to the six-vertex model. The authors also establish a connection between the Ashkin-Teller model and the Potts model, highlighting the critical points and their relation to the partition function.
